title: Display Product Catalog with All Products
description: Verify the product catalog displays all six sample products with correct images, descriptions, prices, and category chips.

steps.description: Navigate to the Product List page.
Check that exactly six product cards are displayed.
Verify each product card shows correct product name, image, description, price, and category chip.

title: Add Single Product to Cart Updates Cart Badge and Cart Contents
description: Verify that adding a single product to the cart updates the cart badge count and cart view contents accordingly.

steps.description: On the Product List page, click the 'Add to Cart' button for one product.
Check that the cart badge count increments to 1.
Navigate to the Cart view.
Verify the cart contains the added product with quantity 1 and correct product details.

title: Add Multiple Different Products to Cart and Verify Totals
description: Add multiple different products with one quantity each and verify cart item count and total price updates correctly.

steps.description: On the Product List page, add three different products to the cart.
Validate that the cart badge count shows 3.
Open the Cart view.
Confirm the cart lists all three products, each with quantity 1.
Calculate and verify the total price shown matches the sum of the three product prices.

title: Increase Product Quantity Updates Cart Quantity and Total Price
description: Verify incrementing the quantity of a product in the cart updates the count, total price, and cart badge count in real-time.

steps.description: Add a product to the cart with initial quantity 1.
Navigate to the Cart view.
Click the '+' button to increase the product quantity to 3.
Ensure the product quantity updates to 3.
Verify the cart badge reflects total quantity 3.
Verify the total price is correctly updated according to quantity multiplied by product price.

title: Decrease Product Quantity to Zero Removes Product from Cart
description: Verify that decreasing a product quantity to zero removes the product from the cart, updates totals, and cart badge accordingly.

steps.description: Add a product to cart with quantity 2.
Go to Cart view.
Click the '-' button twice to reduce quantity to zero.
Verify the product is removed from the cart list.
Ensure the cart badge count is updated accordingly (reduced by product quantity).
Check that total price decrements and reflects remaining cart items correctly.

title: Remove Product Directly from Cart Updates Totals and Badge
description: Verify removing a product from the cart using removal option updates cart contents, total price, and cart badge correctly.

steps.description: Add multiple products to the cart.
Navigate to Cart view.
Use the remove button to delete one product from the cart.
Confirm the product is removed from the cart list.
Validate the cart badge and total price update accordingly.

title: Clear Cart Button Empties Cart and Resets Badge and Totals
description: Verify that clicking the 'Clear Cart' button empties all products from cart, resets total price and cart badge count to zero.

steps.description: Add multiple products to the cart.
Go to Cart view.
Click the 'Clear Cart' button.
Verify the cart is empty with no products listed.
Check the total price display resets to zero.
Ensure the cart badge count is cleared to zero.

title: Checkout Process Shows Confirmation and Clears Cart
description: Verify that performing checkout shows a confirmation message with correct order total and clears the cart afterwards.

steps.description: Add some products to the cart.
Open the Cart view.
Click the 'Checkout' button.
Check for a confirmation message that reflects the accurate total purchase amount.
Verify the cart is cleared after confirmation.
Confirm the cart badge resets to zero.

title: Navigation Toolbar Routes Correctly and Highlights Active Route
description: Verify navigation toolbar correctly routes between Product List and Cart views and highlights the active route.

steps.description: On any page, identify the navigation toolbar.
Click the 'Products' link.
Validate navigation to Product List view.
Check that the 'Products' navigation item is visually highlighted as active.
Click the 'Cart' link in the navigation toolbar.
Validate navigation to Cart view.
Check 'Cart' navigation item is visually highlighted as active.

title: Cart Badge Displays Real-Time Item Count Updates
description: Verify the cart badge on navigation updates in real-time reflecting current item count on adding, removing, and quantity changes.

steps.description: Start with an empty cart.
Add one product from the Product List to the cart.
Validate cart badge shows count 1.
Increase quantity of this product to 3 in the Cart view.
Confirm cart badge updates to 3.
Remove the product entirely from the cart.
Ensure cart badge resets to 0.

title: Product List Components Pass UI Rendering Verification
description: Verify that the Product List component renders UI elements correctly including the grid layout, product cards, images, and Add to Cart buttons.

steps.description: Render the Product List component.
Check the product grid layout displays correctly responsive to viewport size.
Verify each product card shows an image, description, price, category chip, and an enabled 'Add to Cart' button.

title: Cart Component UI Renders Quantity Controls and Totals
description: Test that the Cart component renders product details with functional quantity increment/decrement buttons, remove button, total price, and checkout controls.

steps.description: Access the Cart component with existing cart items.
Validate the presence and state of quantity increment (+) and decrement (-) buttons for each cart item.
Check the remove button for each cart item is visible and clickable.
Verify total price and total item count are displayed correctly.
Ensure the checkout button is enabled when cart is not empty.

title: Cart Service Correctly Adds, Updates, Removes Items and Calculates Totals
description: Unit test the cart service methods for adding items, updating quantities, removing items, clearing cart, and accurately computing totals reactively.

steps.description: Call service method to add a product.
Verify cart state contains the product with correct initial quantity.
Update quantity of the product via service.
Ensure updated quantity is reflected in cart state.
Remove a product using service method.
Validate product is removed from cart state.
Invoke clear cart service method.
Confirm cart state is empty after clear.
Throughout, test reactive total price and item count update immediately upon changes.

title: Verify Routing Configuration Navigates Between Views
description: Test Angular routing configuration routes correctly to product list and cart views based on URL or navigation actions.

steps.description: Navigate programmatically or via URL to product list route.
Confirm Product List component is loaded.
Navigate programmatically or via URL to cart route.
Confirm Cart component is loaded.
